Literature.Title: Effects and mechanisms of the secondary structure on the antimicrobial activity and specificity of antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Mai XT, Huang J, Tan J, Huang Y, Chen Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.6µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=3.2µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=3.2µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3.2µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=1.6µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=1.6µM)
